text: Anthocleista microphylla is a species of plant in the family Gentianaceae. It is found in Cameroon, Equatorial Guinea, Ghana, Nigeria, and São Tomé and Príncipe. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== microphylla Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Herbert Fuller Wernham
title: Anthocleista microphylla
